text: "Crossing the Fire on the Fire" guidelines for privacy protection
Update date: May 7, 2022
label: Policy Change

text: Effective date: May 7, 2022
label: Policy Change

text: overview
You are welcome to choose from Shenzhen Tencent Computer System Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "us".

Shenzhen Tencent Computer System Co., Ltd. in this guidelines specifically refers to Shenzhen Tencent Computer System Co., Ltd., a provider of crossing the fire and its services on the palm of the palm.35th floor) "Crossing the Fire on the Fire" (hereinafter referred to as "Crossing the Fire" or "this product") provided by!

In addition to "Tencent Privacy Policy" and "Tencent Palm Crossing the Fire Software License and Service Agreement", we will also further refine it to you through the "Guidelines for Privacy Protection Protection" ("Guidelines").When we collect, use, store, and share personal information, as well as related rights you enjoy, this guidance is the integrity of the "Tencent Palm Crossing Fire Software License and Service Agreement". The main points are as follows:

• In order to provide you with information such as information reading, friends chat, community interaction, record inquiry, etc., we need to collect your equipment information, account information, and the log information in the game products of the fire line game and the gun war king.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect equipment information, account information, game product log information to provide services such as information reading, friends chat, community interaction, and record inquiry.

text: • You can manage your personal information and related authorization according to this guideline.
label: Edit/Control

text: • We use multi -directional security protection measures to ensure that your personal information protection is at a reasonable level of security.
label: Data Security

text: If you are under the age of 18, please read this agreement and other above agreements with the accompaniment of the legal guardian.
label: Specific Audiences

text: In particular, if you are a child under the age of 14, you should carefully read the "Child Privacy Protection Statement" specially formulated by your parents or the legal guardian, and help you complete the product or service registration process in orderYou can use the products or services we provide.
label: Specific Audiences

text: You can read the entire version of the "Palm Crossing Fire> Guide to Privacy Protection" to understand the more detailed personal information processing rules of personal information types and uses.
1. The information we collect

In the process of using this product service, we will collect the information that you actively provide or because of the service provided by the service as follows to provide you with your services and ensure your account security:

First Party Collection Information

label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect network identity identification information and personal commonly used equipment information to mark product users.

text: If you use WeChat, QQ, and (or) other account numbers (hereinafter referred to as "third -party accounts") as a handicap to log in to this product, we will collect your WeChat, QQ and third -party accounts, the unique logo,Avatar, nickname, used to save your login information so that you can log in at different devices.

First Party Collection Information

text: If you use WeChat, QQ, and (or) third -party accounts as a palm cross -fire account to log in to this product, in order to provide you with services and improve the product experience, we will collect your QQ number, WeChat account, and third -party account number involvedThe only identification, nickname, avatar, and other information you authorized, as well as your related operation information in this product, and show it to you or other users or friends.

First Party Collection Information

, Equipment screen size and other parameters are used to implement information such as this product and activities. For specific situations, please see the privacy policy or related statement of the SDK operator.

Important
First Party Collection Information

text: 1.6, when you interact with other players through text, pictures, voice, videos and other methods in this product, we will access your camera, microphone, calendar, storage, location information, and may be collected and saved what you sendThe content of the above information is used to filter improper content such as pornography, violence, politics, abuse, and malicious advertisements to purify the network environment and maintain a healthy Internet environment.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When you interact with other players, we will get cameras, microphones, calendars, storage, location permissions, collect and save the interactive messages you send to filter improper content such as pornography, violence, politics, abuse, and malicious advertisements.

text: In addition, when you perform video shooting or playback in this product, we will collect your sensor information (linear accelerator) in order to identify and adapt your device horizontal screen status.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect your sensor information to identify and adapt your device horizontal and vertical screen status.

text: 1.7, if you want to interact with nearby product users (for example: access and use "nearby people" and "nearby dynamics" section function), after you authorize consent, we will collect you, geographical location information (including GPS (including GPSInformation, your nearby Wi-Fi, nearby base station ID, that is, cellid), and are used to find nearby users and browse the dynamics released nearby so that you can communicate with nearby users.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information

text: When the positioning is lost, we will collect your sensor information (gyroscope sensor, acceleration sensor, rotating vector sensor, magnetic sensor, gravity sensor information) for auxiliary positioning.

First Party Collection Information
Usage

text: Geographical location information is a sensitive information. Rejecting to provide this information can only cause you to be unable to interact with nearby users, but it does not affect other functions of your normal use of this product. You can also cancel your geographical location information authorization at any time.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Edit/Control
rewrite: Refusing geographical location information can only cause you to be unable to interact with nearby users, do not affect other functions, and cancel the authorization at any time.

text: 2. Storage of information
2.1 Method and period of information storage
label: Data Retention

text: We will store your information in a safe way, including local storage (such as using APP for data cache), database and server logs.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: Store your information through local storage, database and server logs.

text: Under normal circumstances, we will only store your personal information within the time necessary for the purpose of service to achieve service purposes or under the conditions of laws and regulations.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: We will only store your personal information within the time necessary for the purpose of service to achieve service purposes or under the conditions of laws and regulations.

text: 2.2 The area where information storage
label: Data Retention

text: We will store personal information collected in China in China in accordance with laws and regulations.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: Personal information collected in the country is stored in China.

text: 2.3 Notice of the product or service stopping operation
label: Cessation of Operations

text: When our products or services stop operation, we will announce notifications in accordance with relevant laws and regulations and protect your legitimate rights and interests in accordance with the law.
label: Important
Cessation of Operations
rewrite: When the operation is stopped, the announcement will be made in accordance with relevant laws and regulations, and your legitimate rights and interests will be guaranteed in accordance with the law.

text: 3. Information security
3.1 Safety protection measures
We strive to provide protection for users' information security to prevent information leakage, loss, improper use, unauthorized access and disclosure.
label: Data Security

text: We use multi -directional security protection measures to ensure that user personal information protection is at a reasonable level of security, including technological protection methods, management system control, and security system guarantee.
label: Data Security

text: We use industry -leading technical protection measures.
label: Data Security

text: The technical means we use include but not limited to firewalls, encryption (such as SSL), de -identification or anonymous treatment, access control measures, etc.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Use technologies such as firewalls, encryption, de -identification or anonymous processing, access control measures, etc. to protect your information.

text: In addition, we will continue to strengthen the security capabilities of software installed on your device.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Strengthen the security capabilities of software installed on the device side.

text: For example, we will complete some information encryption work locally to consolidate security transmission;
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Complete some information encryption work locally.

text: We will understand the application information and running process information installed by your device to prevent malicious programs such as viruses and Trojans.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Understand the application information and running process information installed in the equipment to prevent malicious procedures such as viruses and Trojan.

text: We have established a special management system, process and organization that guarantees personal information security.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Establish a special management system, processes and organizations that ensure personal information security.

text: For example, we strictly restrict the scope of the personnel of the access information, require them to abide by the confidentiality obligations and audit, and those who violate the obligations will be punished in accordance with regulations.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Strictly restrict the scope of the personnel who access information, and sign a confidentiality agreement with them to punish those who violate the obligations of confidentiality.

text: We will also review the management system, process and organization to prevent unauthorized access, use or disclosure of user information.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Examine the management system, process, and organizations to prevent unauthorized personnel from accessing, using or disclosing users' information on unauthorized personnel.

text: We recommend that you pay full attention to the protection of personal information when using products and services, and we will also provide multiple security functions to help you protect your personal information security.
label: Data Security

text: 3.2 Safety event disposal measures
If personal information leaks and other security incidents occur, we will start emergency plans to prevent security incidents from expanding.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: If personal information leaks and other security incidents occur, we will start emergency plans to prevent security incidents from expanding.

text: After the security incident occurs, we will inform you the basic situation of the security incident in the form of announcement, push notification or email, we are about or already adopted, and our proposals for your response.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: The relevant situation of security incidents will be informed by mail, letter, telephone, push notification, etc. When it is difficult to inform one by one, it will issue an announcement.

text: If it is difficult to notify one by one, we will issue warnings through announcements and other means.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Publish warnings through announcement and other methods.

text: 4. How do we use information

We strictly abide by the provisions of laws and regulations and the agreement with users, in accordance with this guideline and the use and collection information described in the "Tencent Palm Crossing Fire Software License and Service Agreement" and "Tencent Privacy Policy" to provide you with better service servicesEssence
4.1 Information use rules
We will use the collected information according to the following rules:
label: Usage

text: 1), we will provide you with various functions and services according to the information we collect, including basic information reading, friends chat, community interaction, record query functions, etc.;
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: The collected information is used to provide basic information reading, friends chat, community interaction, and record query functions.

text: 2), we will analyze the operation of our products based on the frequency and situation of this product, fault information, performance information, etc. to ensure the security of the service, optimize our products, and improve our service quality.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: The frequency and situation of the product, fault information, and performance information are used to analyze the operation of the product, ensure the safety of service, and optimize the product.

text: We will not combine the information we store in the analysis software with the personal identity information you provide.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: We will not combine the information we store in the analysis software with the personal identity information you provide.

text: 4.2 The way to obtain consent after notifying the purpose of the change
We will use the collected information in the purpose covered by this guideline.

If we use your personal information beyond the stated purpose and scope of direct or reasonable connection with the collection, we will notify you again and obtain your express consent before using your personal information.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will tell you again before using your personal information to use your personal information beyond the scope of collection purposes.

text: 6. Your rights

During your use of this product service, we may provide you with the corresponding operation settings according to the specific situation of this product, so that you can inquire, delete, correct or remove your relevant personal information. You can refer to the specific guidance of the product for operation.
label: Edit/Control
Important
rewrite: You can query, delete, more correct or withdraw your relevant personal information through the corresponding operation settings.

text: In addition, we have set up a complaint report channel, and your opinions will be dealt with in a timely manner.
label: Edit/Control

text: 7. Changes
We may revise this guidelines in a timely manner.
When the terms of this guideline change, we will prompt you the guidance after the version is updated in an appropriate manner.
label: Policy Change

text: Please read the content of the privacy protection or guidelines carefully after the change. You continue to use this product to indicate that you agree to collect, process or use your personal information according to the updated privacy protection guidelines.
label: Policy Change
Important
Risk
rewrite: If you continue to use the service, you will be deemed to agree to accept the revised privacy policy.

text: 8. Protection of minors
We attach great importance to the protection of personal information of minors and continue to explore the updated personal information protection methods of minors.
label: Specific Audiences

text: According to the relevant laws and regulations, if you are a minor under the age of 18, you should obtain the consent of your parents or legal guardians before using Tencent's service.

text: In particular, if you are a child under the age of 14, you should help you complete the product or service registration process by your parents or the legal guardian so that you can use the products or services we provide.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: If you are a child under the age of 14, your parents or legal guardians should help you complete the product or service registration process.

text: We will deal with and reply to you within a reasonable time.

Child Privacy Protection Statement
Tencent is committed to protecting the personal information of children using our products or services.

"Children's Privacy Protection Statement" (hereinafter referred to as "this statement") and "Tencent Privacy Policy" are intended to explain to guardians (hereinafter referred to as "you") and children how we collect, use, store and process children's personal information, and how we Ways for you and your children to access, correct, delete and protect this information.

text: Unless otherwise agreed, the terms and acronyms used in this statement have the same meanings as those in the Tencent Service Agreement and Tencent Privacy Policy.

Specific Audiences
